Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the event will feature the dumping of "gallons" of real blood on clubgoers, when in fact the organizers clarified that they will be using synthetic blood.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim that a nightclub in Amsterdam is hosting a "Blood Rave" event with real blood.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the event will involve real blood based on the opening scene of the movie Blade, without providing any evidence or confirmation from the organizers.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the event will use synthetic blood, as clarified by the organizers.
